TopicTitle: Is there anyone has a working MJ2 on Mac OS X?

Articles.Content:
I AM TOTALLY CONFUSED while i extracted the zip, wtf it has a dll? How can I use MJ2 on my Mac or where to download a Mac Version?

PS:I'm a junior high school student in China, if I have any problem with grammar, please tell me or just ignore it
You install it on a Mac the same way you do it on windows. The dll is executed by mono, which is a cross-platform .NET runtime, so every mod is compatible with every operating system.
